page.title: 08GAMES CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: BULLDOG Any number of children can play.A certain area is marked out.One person is "on".This person shouts "Bulldog",and others must run from one side of the area to the other."On"must catch these.If caught they join that person,helping to catch.The last one caught is regarded as the winner. KERBY Two players stand on a kerbside opposite one another.Each takes it in turn to throw a football at the kerb opposite in such a way that it rebounds to the thrower.If it does rebound the thrower has another turn. First to a pre-decided total wins TIG Any number of children.No set area.One child is "on".Others run away."On"must chase others and touch (tig)them to show that they are caught.
